content: simple scarf knitting pattern by linda gaga redsockdesigns instagram @linda gga @redsock_designs r e d s o c k d e s i g n s e t s y c o m this simple scarf knitting pattern is perfect for beginners looking for a relaxing project and for experienced knitters who enjoy a mindful knit the result is a long cozy scarf you ll reach for again and again difficulty beginner size one size dimensions 30 cm /12 in width x 280 cm / 9 ft 2 in length yarn drops soft tweed content 50% wool 25% alpaca 25% viscose 8 ply / dk 5 balls needle size 4 mm / us 6 blocked gauge 21 sts x 21 row in 10x10 cm / 4x4 in methods used flat knitting cast on bind off stitches knit purl abbreviations r - row rs - right side ws - wrong side sl1 - slip one stitch k - knit p - purl here we go cast on 60 sts work ribbing r1 rs sl1 p2 k2 repeat to last 3 sts p2 k1 turn to ws r2 ws sl1 k2 p2 repeat to last 3 sts k2 p1 turn to rs repeat r1-2 nineteen more times 40 row in total continue knitting in stockinette stitch r3 rs k60 turn to ws r4 ws p60 turn to rs the edges of the scarf may curl inward this is completely normal as stockinette stitch naturally does that repeat r3 4 until your scarf reaches the desired length making sure to reserve about half of the yarn ball for the ribbing end with ribbing - repeat r1-2 twenty times 40 row in total bind off in an established pattern weave in yarn ends hand wash and dry flat block if necessary wrap yourself in your new cozy scarf and enjoy
